title: Valor
summaries: The Valor is a yoyo that can extend up to 14 tiles away from the player. Its flight time lasts 11 seconds before returning to the player. The Valor can be found in the Locked Gold Chests found in the Dungeon, but it is not guaranteed that every Dungeon will contain one. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it can also be obtained from Golden Lock Boxes.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Damage: 28 / 22 (Melee)
